msg: Adopted AI-DEV framework: taskmaster.py, state/, prompts/, KB/ migrated into project. All 35 plan tasks from v4 already complete.
FW-001 done. Added unattended execution directive to CLAUDE.md + CLEANUP-001 task to roadmap. Starting WIRE phase.

WIRE-002 done. BootstrapReadiness wired into loop: persistent instance, check_all at startup + after flush, bootstrap prompt injected into system prompt, /readiness uses persistent instance.

WIRE-003 done. OutcomeTracker wired: gate decisions recorded in exit flush, promotions recorded in consolidation, gut deltas forward-linked to outcomes.
